hadiths.text: Makhrama b. Sulaiman narrated it with the same chain of narrators and he made this addition:"He then went to the water-skin and brushed his teeth and performed ablution well. He did not pour water but a little. He then awakened me and I stood up," and the rest of the hadith is the same

chapter.ara-name: باب الدُّعَاءِ فِي صَلاَةِ اللَّيْلِ وَقِيَامِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The prayer and the supplication of the Prophet (ﷺ) at night
